name: The Detective (itch) (TK Creations)
description:
A detective has been hired to find out what happened to a family living in the suburbs. When the detective arrives, he must use his unique visual powers to solve various puzzles and collect clues in order to piece together what happened, who caused their disappearance and if possible, how to save them.

Controls:

WASD - Move Player

E - Interact

F - Switch Vision
